item.description:
@BORED wrote:

Problem 1.Save Zone
Problem 2.Object
1.Hi, i Was Putting save zone For my new starter place but it dosnt work i chang i compile and i run here is the code : public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3473 && absX <= 3501 && absY >= 3523 && absY <=3467 ) || heightLevel == 1) { return true; }else{ return false; } }
Can Somenone help My With This Problem

2.Ok I Want Add A Training Area And Want To Add A Dummy
I Do That but my compiler Says 1 Error Here Is The Code : public void AddObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) { MakeGlobalObject(3492, 3494, 3494, 0, 10);//Dummy outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8)); /*CREATE OBJECT*/ if (NewObjectID > -1) { outStream.writeByte(151);

Thank You If You Can Help My
~Bored.

I Found This Up : { if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) { person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType); } } } }
